title: Beef Barley and Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ['450g stewing beef steak, diced', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '500ml water', '2 tablespoons margarine', '2 large carrots, diced', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '450g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1.5 litres water', '3 beef stock cubes', '4 tablespoons pearl barley', '4 tablespoons soured cream']
